nodes.text: A Human male prisoner had been convicted of cheating at Sabacc on the planet of Concord Dawn. Unknown to the Sabacc player, cheating was a capital offense on Concord Dawn. A Devaronian magistrate, in league with the anti-human terrorist group known as the Diversity Alliance, sent the prisoner to the group's headquarters on the planet Ryloth for execution in 24 ABY. He was eaten by the Shistavanen Hovrak.
The prisoner's only appearance was as a minor character in Kevin J. Anderson and Rebecca Moesta's 1997 young reader novel Young Jedi Knights: Diversity Alliance.
